DOC.brief_title: Laser Versus Ultrasonic Lithotripsy Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy Staghorn Stones
DOC.detailed_description: Patients complete staghorn stone eligible percutaneous nephrolithotomy ( PNL ) randomize two group . Group 1 : undergo Laser lithotripsy PNL Group 2 : undergo ultrasonic lithotripsy PNL
